column2: an A.M. Eatery////The first time. Place was packed and service was still super quick. Food that was ordered was the pancake flight
column4: half/half benny and a hash dish. I tried everything and was all good. One of my pancakes was candied orange
column7: and lemon anglaise with shortbread crumble... best pancake I've ever eaten. Also served fresh fruit juices that were
